tool.name: tRNAscan-SE

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the value will be passed in the argument list (ie. the switch won't be used)
Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Search for bacterial tRNAs (use bacterial tRNA model).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Search for archaeal tRNAs  (use archaeal tRNA model).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Use general tRNA model (cytoplasmic tRNAs from all 3 domains included).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Search using Cove analysis only (max sensitivity, very slow).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Save final results to output file.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Save tRNA secondary structures to output file.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Output results in ACeDB output format instead of default tabular format.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Save statistics summary for run in output file (speed, # tRNAs found in each part of search, etc).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Show both primary and secondary structure components to covariance model bit scores.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Quiet mode (credits & run option selections suppressed).

tool.description: Scan a sequence file for tRNAs using tRNAscan, EufindtRNA and tRNA covariance models -- default is for use with eukaryotic sequences.
